Russia says its forces move forward after Ukraine withdraws from AvdiivkaRussia said on Saturday that its forces had inflicted a series of defeats on Ukrainian forces along the 1,000-km (620-mile) front line just as Ukrainian troops withdrew from the devastated eastern town of Avdiivka. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 14:30:40 GMT VKGE4IYDQRNOLGPXGEZQVB7QDI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-its-forces-move-forward-after-ukraine-withdraws-avdiivka-2024-02-17/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
US says its forces strike unmanned surface vessel, anti-ship cruise missile near YemenU.S. forces conducted two strikes against a mobile anti-ship cruise missile and a mobile unmanned surface vessel (USV) launched from Houthi-controlled areas of Yemen, the U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 14:24:49 GMT EAMDHDWWJNPXVN53TPIA3SLEUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-its-forces-strike-unmanned-surface-vessel-anti-ship-cruise-missile-near-2024-02-17/Reuters世界中东地区
Germany may need to exceed 2% NATO spending target, defence minister saysGermany may need to spend more than 2% of its gross domestic product on defence to deter Russia in the coming years, German Defence Minister Boris Pistorius said on Saturday. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 14:23:15 GMT YJDQT7PBHBKVDOQCFLQWFQOLFY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-may-need-to-exceed-2-nato-spending-target-defence-minister-says-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny's team will continue his work, says ally YarmyshAlexei Navalny's vision for change in Russia will be kept alive by his team, his ally and spokesperson Kira Yarmysh said in an interview. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 14:04:36 GMT PTZTSKYEONIMLBJILCFJIBWPAE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-team-will-continue-his-work-says-ally-yarmysh-2024-02-17/Andrius Sytas世界欧洲
US VP Harris: Will work to ensure Russia pays damages to UkraineU.S. Vice President Kamala Harris said that U.S. President Joe Biden's administration stood ready to support Ukraine in its war with Russia for "as long as it takes" and would push for Russia to pay damages to Ukraine following the end of the war. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 13:47:51 GMT UX5PKP27GVKTFDRIVEF73K5PLEAD https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/us-vp-harris-will-work-ensure- Russia-country-damages-ukraine-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
China foreign minister warns against decoupling at Munich Security ConferenceChinese foreign minister Wang Yi warned the West that it would be making a historical mistake if it sought to decouple from China in the interests of reducing risk. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 13:11:43 GMT YUT7CHWTOVO2XKLDBB7ES4HZ7E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-foreign-minister-warns-against-decoupling-munich-security-conference-2024-02-17/Reuters世界中国
Blinken sees 'extraordinary' opportunity for Israel to normalise ties with neighborsThere is "an extraordinary opportunity" in the coming months for Israel to normalise ties with its Arab neighbors, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Saturday, while also emphasizing the need for the creation of a Palestinian state. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 12:49:34 GMT ZIFDJ5Z6CVLHXDLGXOVIFS43NA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinking-extraordinary-opportunity-israel-to-be-integrated-into-the-middle-east-2024-02-17/Humeyra Pamuk世界中东地区
Ukraine shoots down three Russian warplanes, air force chief saysUkrainian forces shot down two Russian Su-34 fighter-bombers and one Su-35 fighter in the skies over eastern Ukraine on Saturday, the country's air force chief said. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 12:17:11 GMT R43MB3PY6FKQJEODQJZDBHNIIU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-shoots-down- Three-Russian-warplanes-air-force-chief-says-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Stop whining about Trump and focus on Europe's interests, Dutch prime minister saysOutgoing Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte, the frontrunner to be the next secretary-general of NATO, said on Saturday that Europe should stop whining about Donald Trump and focus instead on what it could do for Ukraine. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:27:20 GMT LXVOBH2A4VIRDGKMKVCFFMZWQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/stop-whining-about-trump-focus-european-interests-dutch-pm-says-2024-02-17/John Irish世界欧洲
Israeli stages airstrikes across Gaza, makes arrests at hospitalIsraeli forces carried out arrests in Gaza's largest functioning hospital, health officials and the military said on Saturday, as airstrikes hit across the enclave and rain battered Palestinians taking shelter in Rafah. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 11:22:59 GMT DDG76L4YYZPITLS53DM7JRXLUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-stages-airstrikes-across-gaza-makes-arrests-hospital-2024-02-17/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Maayan Lubell世界中东地区
Navalny was struck down with 'sudden death syndrome', his mother was told at Russian prisonAlexei Navalny's mother was told on Saturday that Russia's most prominent opposition leader had been struck down by "sudden death syndrome" and that his body would not be handed over to the family until an investigation was completed, his team said. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 10:53:49 GMT WHWAMQRLL5PJPIMSQ6AN6I6ZOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/alexei-navalny-is-dead-spokeswoman-confirms-2024-02-17/Reuters世界欧洲
